feed.title: Inherited IDs - A safer, more powerful alternative to BIP-118 (ANYPREVOUT) for scaling Bitcoin

entry.title: Inherited IDs - A safer, more powerful alternative to BIP-118 (ANYPREVOUT) for scaling Bitcoin
entry.summary: John has posted some responses in his Github repository regarding the topic of "btc-iids". It is recommended to respond to him via a Github issue or similar means. The Github repository link provided can be used to access John's responses and engage in further discussion.
